column1: Name: 300Mbps Wireless N Gigabit GPON Router

"Package Contents": "300Mbps Wireless N Gigabit GPON Router XN020-G3
RJ45 Ethernet Cable
Quick Installation Guide
Power Adapter"

"Environment": "Operating Temperature: 0℃~40℃ (32℉ ~104℉)
Storage Temperature: -40℃~70℃ (-40℉ ~158℉)
Operating Humidity: 10%~90% non-condensing
Storage Humidity: 5%~90% non-condensing"

column1: Highlights: A GPON modem with wireless AP and 1-port Switch
Compliant with the ITU-T G.984/G.988 GPON standards
column2: XN020-G3 supports maximum data rates of up to 2.488Gbps downstream and 1.244Gbps upstream.

column1: TR-069 protocol enables an operator to remotely configure and manage end-user devices.
